titles.title: Intrastate Tow Truck Transportation Technical Correction Act of 1995
To make a technical correction to section 601 of the Federal Aviation Administration Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure. Economic and Educational Opportunities, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 2/8/1995--Introduced. Intrastate Tow Truck Transportation Technical Correction Act of 1995 - Amends Federal transportation law to declare that provisions relating to the prohibition against State regulation of price, route, or service of a motor carrier (other than a carrier affiliated with a direct air carrier) or a private motor carrier that provides for the transportation of property shall not apply to the transportation for hire of a motor vehicle by a tow truck, if it is performed: (1) at the request of a law enforcement officer; or (2) without the prior consent of the owner of the motor vehicle (nonconsent tows).
